attributes.action: Give the war veteran who raised money by walking around his garden a knighthood.
attributes.background: A veteran has walked his garden to raise money. Hes currently raised over 4 million. Hes not only served his country in war hes now served in a pandemic. He deserves to be recognised for his hard work. Hes 99 years old and still serving his country

rejection.details:
In any case we can't publish petitions calling for people to receive an honour. 

You can find out more about the honours process and how to nominate someone at www.gov.uk/honours
